name: crunch
effect: Inflicts regular damage. Has a 20% chance to lower the target’s Defense by one stage.
short_effect: Has a 20% chance to lower the target’s Defense by one stage.

flavor_text.diamond_pearl: The user crunches up the foe with sharp fangs. It may also lower the target’s Defense stat.
flavor_text.platinum: The user crunches up the foe with sharp fangs. It may also lower the target’s Defense stat.
flavor_text.heartgold_soulsilver: The user crunches up the foe with sharp fangs. It may also lower the target’s Defense stat.
